import React from"react";import HorizontalTimeline from"react-horizontal-timeline";import Resume from"../../resume.json";import AwardCard from"../elements/AwardCard";export default class Timeline extends React.Component{constructor(props){super(props);this.state={curIdx:0,prevIdx:-1};}//state = { value: 0, previous: 0 };
render(){const curIdx=this.state.curIdx;const currDescription=Resume.Awards[curIdx].description;const currName=Resume.Awards[curIdx].name;const currUrl=Resume.Awards[curIdx].html_url;const currImage=Resume.Awards[curIdx].image;return React.createElement("div",{className:"is-centered"},React.createElement("div",{style:{width:"100%",height:"100px",margin:"0 auto",marginTop:"20px",fontSize:"15px"}},React.createElement(HorizontalTimeline,{styles:{background:"#f8f8f8",foreground:"#1A79AD",outline:"#dfdfdf"},index:this.state.curIdx,indexClick:index=>{const curIdx=this.state.curIdx;this.setState({curIdx:index});},values:Resume.Awards.map(x=>x.date)})),React.createElement("br",null),React.createElement("div",{className:"columns is-centered"},React.createElement(AwardCard,{award:Resume.Awards[curIdx]})));}}
